name: Nick Solana
text: it does need faith bay. sandamnukal na kakulitan at charm lang. hehehe. kaya nga may mga CSOs to do these stuff na we are very busy to do ourselves all of the time . and they need our support. ;) the DepEd initiative needs backing of a congressional resolution din i think dahil 'official' text books ng public schools ang apektado nyan.. oh well.. so many needful things.
